fr.univartois.ili.fsnet.core
Class LoggedUsersContainer

java.lang.Object
  fr.univartois.ili.fsnet.core.LoggedUsersContainer

public class LoggedUsersContainer
extends Object

This singleton stores the logged in users. The unique instance is stored in application scope in order to retrieve data in the presentation layer

Author:
Mathieu Boniface < mat.boniface {At} gmail.com >
